TABLE.NAME: stalloc
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_stalloc in a course.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the instance of the assignment. Displayed at the top of each page.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the assignment. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the settings for this assign module instance were last modified.

FIELD.NAME: initialized
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> Plugin is initialized, 0 -> Plugin is not initialized.

FIELD.NAME: rating_number
FIELD.COMMENT: How many ratings must a student submit.

FIELD.NAME: phone_required
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> Phone required, 0 -> Phone NOT required.

FIELD.NAME: allocationstarttime
FIELD.COMMENT: only set while running

FIELD.NAME: allocationstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: -1 -> failure while running allocation, 0 -> allocation has not been running, 1 -> allocation running, 2 -> allocation finished

FIELD.NAME: startdate_declaration
FIELD.COMMENT: The startdate where students can use the declaration.

FIELD.NAME: enddate_declaration
FIELD.COMMENT: The enddate where students can use the declaration.

FIELD.NAME: startdate_direct_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The startdate where students can submit their direct allocation chair.

FIELD.NAME: enddate_direct_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The enddate where students can submit their direct allocation chair.

FIELD.NAME: startdate_rating
FIELD.COMMENT: The startdate where students can submit their ratings.

FIELD.NAME: enddate_rating
FIELD.COMMENT: The enddate where students can submit their ratings.

FIELD.NAME: startdate_rating_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The startdate where students will be allocated.

FIELD.NAME: enddate_rating_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The enddate where students will be allocated.

FIELD.NAME: startdate_thesis_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The startdate where students will receive the thesis name, startdate and examiners.

FIELD.NAME: enddate_thesis_alloc
FIELD.COMMENT: The enddate where students will receive the thesis name, startdate and examiners.

FIELD.NAME: publish_results
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> Results published, 0 -> Results NOT published.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this stalloc instance.

INDEX.NAME: course
INDEX.COMMENT: The course this stalloc instance belongs to.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_chair
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the chairs.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the chair.

FIELD.NAME: holder
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the chair holder.

FIELD.NAME: contact_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the chair contact.

FIELD.NAME: contact_phone
FIELD.COMMENT: The phone number of the chair contact.

FIELD.NAME: contact_mail
FIELD.COMMENT: The mail address of the chair contact.

FIELD.NAME: distribution_key
FIELD.COMMENT: The distribution key of the chair.

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> Chair is active, 0 -> Chair is inactive.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the chair.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_chair_member
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the chair member.

FIELD.NAME: is_examiner
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> Examiner, 0 -> No Examiner.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the chair member.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_student
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the student.

FIELD.NAME: declaration
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = declaration confirmed, 0 = declaration not confirmed (yet).

FIELD.NAME: permission
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = permission confirmed, 0 = permission not confirmed (yet).

FIELD.NAME: rating
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = rating done, 0 = rating missing.

FIELD.NAME: phone1
FIELD.COMMENT: the primary phone number

FIELD.NAME: phone2
FIELD.COMMENT: the secondary phone number

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the student.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_allocation
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the actual allocations.

FIELD.NAME: direct_allocation
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = direct allocation, 0 = drawn allocation.

FIELD.NAME: checked
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 = allocation was checked by the chair, 0 = allocation was not yet checked by the chair, -1 = student was declined by chair.

FIELD.NAME: thesis_name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the thesis.

FIELD.NAME: startdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of the thesis beginning

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the allocation.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_allocation_examiner
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the examiners for the allocation.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the examiner/allocation.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_declaration_text
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the declaration text.

FIELD.NAME: active
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 -> declaration is active, 0 -> declaration is inactive.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the declaration text.

TABLE.NAME: stalloc_rating
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about the student ratings.

FIELD.NAME: rating
FIELD.COMMENT: Chairrating of this student. Small Number = Small interest. High number = high interest.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for the declaration text.
